attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On October 1st 2007, the age limit to buy tobacco was increased to 18.

Unfair to 16 and 17 year olds who had already started smoking before the ban have now had to suffer because of it.

Also teenagers who smoked between the ages of 11 - 15 found it easy and some still find it easy to buy tobacco from newsagents and corner shops.

By increasing the age limit alot of teenagers may start smoking as a way to rebel against the government

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
